WorkItem.ClosedComment: There's nothing you need to do here, AutoMapper only really cares about the destination members.  It only tries to map what it finds on the destination type.
WorkItem.Description:
I would like to be able to ignore SOURCE properties, as my destination may possibly not include something which the source does. A good example is if you would like to map from a DataContracted type via a service reference. .Net generates some new properties on the type (ExtensionData for example) which I do not want my target to have to implement.
 
Can I do this at the moment, or is this a new feature request?
 
Thanks.
